meanings.definition: A type of agave plant native to Mexico.
meanings.sent1: The farmer planted magueys in his garden.
meanings.sent2: The landscape was filled with magueys swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the tall magueys but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: The magueys stood tall like guardians of the desert.
meanings.sent5: The magueys' sharp leaves shimmered under the hot sun.

meanings.definition: The plural form of maguey, referring to multiple agave plants.
meanings.sent1: In the field, we could see rows of magueys stretching into the distance.
meanings.sent2: The villagers harvested the magueys to make traditional beverages.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the towering magueys.
meanings.sent4: The magueys in the garden whispered secrets to each other in the night.
meanings.sent5: The magueys' spiky appearance deterred any curious animals.
